TEXT.TEXTVALUE: Point the mouse to each requirement of the experiment to know the name / Click the “Continue” button to start the experiment.
A bottle of waste water sample is collected from a polluted lake.
The water sample is transferred to a beaker labeled as waste water sample.
The pH meter is switched on and displayed the reading as 7.00.
The electrode of pH meter is taken out from the storage solution.
The bottle containing distilled water is taken from the lab table.
The lower portion of the electrode is washed with distilled water.
The bottle labeled as distilled water is replaced into the lab table.
A tissue paper is taken from the box.
The lower portion of electrode is wiped with tissue paper and dipped in the beaker containing Acetate Buffer, pH 4.00.
The reading in the pH meter is displayed as 4.00.
The electrode is taken from the beaker containing Acetate buffer, pH 4.00.
The bottle containing distilled water is taken from the lab table.
The lower portion of the electrode is washed with distilled water.
The bottle labeled as distilled water is replaced into the lab table.
A tissue paper is taken from the box.
The lower portion of electrode is wiped with tissue paper.
The electrode is replaced into the storage solution.
The reading in the pH meter is displayed as 7.00.
